ygData.subject: Re: Geforce 4 MX vs Geforce 4 Ti
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks to everyone for their responses. I take it that, since the Ti is not pci format, the Mx will do alright. I was concerned about the lack of DirectX 8.1
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks to everyone for their responses. I take it that, since the Ti
is not pci format, the Mx will do alright. I was concerned about the
lack of DirectX 8.1 support. The info I have gathered so far
indicates that the Mx is built to support DX 7. Anyone know how the
lack of 8.1 support might affect the game? Everyone who has come in
positive for the Mx has said the frame rates are good enough. What
about other graphics factors?

Has anyone run both the Mx and Ti on the same system? How did they
compare? Since I cannot run the Ti due to lack of pci, what am I
missing? Also, how does the Mx compare to a Gforce2 with the 64
memory load? Anyone have experience with such?

Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@y..., "justin" <pavisoj@q...> wrote:
> I run Direct X 8.1 and have no problems with my GeForce 4 MX
440 card on my system.
